title: WB Color Picker Web Component
description: Schema for wb-color-picker custom element attributes

value.description: Current color value in any supported format (hex, rgb, hsl)

format.description: Color format for input and output

variant.description: Visual variant of the color picker

show-presets.description: Whether to show preset color swatches

show-eyedropper.description: Whether to show eyedropper tool (if supported)

preset-colors.description: JSON string containing array of preset colors

label.description: Label text displayed above the color picker

help.description: Help text displayed below the color picker

disabled.description: Whether the color picker is disabled

readonly.description: Whether the color picker is read-only

required.description: Whether a color selection is required

id.description: Unique identifier for the color picker

onchange.description: JavaScript code to execute when color changes

oninput.description: JavaScript code to execute on input events

onfocus.description: JavaScript code to execute when picker gains focus

onblur.description: JavaScript code to execute when picker loses focus

onopen.description: JavaScript code to execute when picker opens

onclose.description: JavaScript code to execute when picker closes

onwb-color-picker:change.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-color-picker:change event

onwb-color-picker:input.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-color-picker:input event

onwb-color-picker:open.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-color-picker:open event

onwb-color-picker:close.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-color-picker:close event

aria-labelledby.description: ID of element that labels this color picker

aria-describedby.description: ID of element that describes this color picker

aria-expanded.description: Whether the picker popup is expanded (automatically managed)

aria-invalid.description: Indicates if the selected color is invalid

aria-required.description: Indicates if color selection is required

role.description: ARIA role for the color picker
